title: Add configurable weight caps for fit tier when deal-dynamics risks are present (scoring config only)

sections.text: Introduce configuration fields in the scoring pipeline to cap fit-tier contribution when procurement stage, competition, or internal alignment risk signals are triggered, without changing ranking logic yet. Persist the config with sensible defaults derived from the GOLD-97 audit report and ensure it can be tuned per workspace/environment. This ticket focuses only on adding the config plumbing and applying the cap at score-component calculation time; validation and UX changes will be handled in subsequent tickets.
